content: I hope you will be patient and be perfecting. Our cruise ship is about to depart. Stay tuned

Ezek.io, a celebrity avant-garde art focused Entertainment NFT Platform, will release the "Phanta Bear" NFT Collection with 10,000 limited editions on 2022/01/01 created by Ezek. PHANTACi was founded in 2006 by Jay Chou, the Mandopop King, with his partner Ric. Ezek's first NFT collection with PHANTACi, Phanta Bear, will explore the new artistic possibilities of combining celebrity entertainment, pop culture, and the metaverse.

ğŸ»Bearos EmpireğŸ» Community Reimbursement Update

Hi, Bearo bro and sis!

On December 22, 2021 (GMT+8) and January 28, 2022 (GMT+8), our Discord server suffered malicious attacks from hackers. This resulted in some community members losing some of their assets after clicking on the fraudulent links.

Right now, the community asset security team has completed their investigation of the two hacks. As of today, we have reimbursed a total of 58 scammed victims (with wallet address validated) for ğŸ’°14.14 ETH in total (including gas). Please reach out to our mods if you have yet to receive your reimbursement! Thank you for your patience.

Our ğŸ»Bearos EmpireğŸ» community takes the safety of your assets seriously. Our asset security team has updated the security system of our community, including safety verifications and more. 

To raise awareness for security, we will conduct security education AMAs regularly in the community. Allow us to share with you again a few tips to avoid scams:

1. Store your private key and seed phrase offline.
2. Try to use two separate wallets for airdrops and asset safekeeping (a cold wallet is recommended for the latter).
3. Never download software from unknown sources. If you have opened any, please check your authorizations immediately.
4. Before any authorization, confirm the security of the smart contract.
5. Be extra careful of your asset safety when getting airdrops and other claims. Try to move your assets to a cold wallet as soon as possible after you have completed your claim.
6. Turn on the 2-factor authentication setting for your Discord account. Turn off your DMs.

Thank you once more for seeing Phantabear through rain or shine. We look forward to building a stronger and closer Bearo Empire community with you!

ğŸ“£Community AnnocementğŸ“£

ED recently stepped down from the founding team due to personal reasons, we sincerely appreciate his effort and dedication toward building the whole community throughout the past month.

We know our Bear brothers and sisters are a bit puzzled by the recent changes in our team and the community. We would like to clarify the following: 

1. Regarding recent team reorganization: 
To better serve the Bear community, we are restructuring the community management teams (including mod team and pioneer team). Meanwhile, our technical team will not be affected due to any personnel changes, please rest assured!

2. Community wallet and distribution: 
We are working hard on drafting the details of community treasure plan, such as the exact distribution and detailed usage, we appreciate your patience. 

3. Metaverse concert:
We have been working hard on constructing the architecture for the metaverse concert, and we welcome everyone to brainstorm together and let us know your suggestions. 

4. Roadmap
We will continue to execute our roadmap as planned. Please visit the Roadmap section on our website for detailed information.

Time flies, our Bear Empire has been established for nearly 2 months, and we still have a lot to improve and learn. Thank you all for your patience and tolerance, and we hope to continue to work with everyone here to build our own Bear community!

ğŸ»PHB Community Education Seminar - NFT Security 

It has been all over the news in the previous few days that one of the most popular NFT marketplaces has been hit by a phishing attack, resulting in a loss of 1.7M USD in NFTs. 

Without a doubt, NFT trading has been booming since 2021, shaking up the art world and creating countless opportunities. Nevertheless, many are still concerned about the safety of NFT trades. After all, are NFTs safe digital assets? 

To further promote NFT Security and answer some of your questions, we are inviting David â€“Director and Advisor from ACE Exchange, to share more about NFT Safety on our Discord on this Friday, March 4th. 

Event Agenda: 
# NFT Knowledge 
#Q&A Session 
#NFT Knowledge Quiz (participants will stand a chance to win a prize.)

ğŸ»Hello Bearo brothers and sisters,
We have made some adjustments to ensure a smooth transition to the new operational plans. We have put together a few items to share with you around our team planning and status updates.

**Onboarding**
After careful consideration and evaluation, we have decided to move in a different direction from the CEO and Marketing Director candidates that Ezek had recommended. The professionals who fill these roles will have crucial impacts on our projectâ€™s direction and long-term development. Therefore, we are approaching other candidates (CEO & consultant) who would be a better fit for this project. Furthermore, PHANTACi and Ezek have reached an agreement to adjust the PhantaBear team. Superman and Can will be the core of the team to ensure the progress and execution of the project. We also have a technical project manager and marketing planners joining the team on May 9. We will add additional positions to expand our team with different professional fields.

**Roadmap**
Regarding the utilities of Phancy Pets and the staking (point) system which were planned by Ezek, the framework and the design do not meet our project plan. Therefore, we must evaluate carefully whether the staking (point) system will have a positive impact on the project. Before drafting a full plan, we will put our focus on developing the PhantaBear website and PhantaBear online store. Meanwhile, we will work closely with our new project manager to improve efficiencies, initiate new plans, and develop more exclusive activities for holders.

**Community**
In May, we organized the â€œPhantaBear x Alpacadabraz x FOMO DOGï¼š The Voice of nature Singing Battle 2022â€ and we will start executing an event proposed by the winner of the â€œCommunity Event Proposal Competitionâ€. Also, we have organized some exclusive benefits like the raffles for the â€œLimited Edition Golden Autographed Bearâ€ and â€œJAY CHOU CARNIVAL WORLD TOUR Concert Ticketâ€ to our holders. Moving forward, we would like to shape the PhantaBear community towards three core elements: Music, Art, and Fashion. We are very grateful for all of the contributions from our Mod Team and Bearos from the community and we would like to include their names in future activities and announcements, so everyone in the community knows who has been working hard behind the scenes.

**ï¼Š "PhantaBear 2022 Spring/Summer Limited T-Shirt" status update:**
The team submitted the design draft to the factory for production at the end of March, but due to the pandemic, the factory's production line, raw materials, and cargo transportation have been greatly affected. The shirt will be delivered to the PhantaBear team by the end of June and  distribution will then begin.

We know everyone is anxious about the recent changes, we feel the same! But we also believe**" THE BEST IS YET TO COME"**. We have faced many challenges along the way, but we need to stay united and continue to move in the right direction. Step by step, we will make improvements. Our success will be a result of the sum of these dedicated efforts.

Thank you for all your support and patience, we are confident that our journey onwards will be fruitful and fulfilling.

Superman/Can
